components.name: Professional ShadCN Navbar
components.description: Clean, professional navbar with mobile menu, dark mode toggle, and authentication buttons. Features sticky positioning and smooth responsive behavior.
components.installCommand: npx shadcn@latest add button navigation-menu sheet separator
components.styleNotes: Uses CSS variables for colors, works perfectly with tweakcn theme system. Automatically adapts to light/dark modes.

components.name: Clean Header Navigation
components.description: Simple horizontal navigation with logo, menu items, and authentication buttons
components.styleNotes: Clean horizontal layout with logo left, navigation center, auth buttons right - simple and professional.

components.name: Clean Horizontal Navbar
components.description: Professional horizontal navbar with logo, navigation links, and dual action buttons - perfect for SaaS and business websites
components.styleNotes: Clean horizontal layout with professional spacing, includes brand logo and dual action buttons for sign in and conversion.

components.name: Aceternity Sidebar
components.description: Modern sidebar navigation component with collapsible functionality, menu items, and smooth animations - perfect for dashboard and admin interfaces
components.styleNotes: Advanced sidebar component with collapsible functionality and smooth animations - ideal for dashboard layouts and admin panels with comprehensive navigation needs.

components.name: Aceternity Resizable Navbar
components.description: Dynamic resizable navbar component with smooth animations, adaptive layout, and interactive resizing functionality - perfect for responsive dashboard interfaces
components.styleNotes: Advanced resizable navbar with dynamic width adjustment and smooth animations - ideal for adaptive dashboard layouts and complex navigation requirements.

components.name: Aceternity Floating Navbar
components.description: Modern floating navbar with smooth backdrop blur, elegant hover effects, and dynamic styling - perfect for modern websites with clean UI aesthetics
components.styleNotes: Sleek floating navbar with glass-like blur effect and elegant hover states - adapts to any theme and provides a modern, subtle navigation experience.
